column4: is there some ISO I can download that contains multiple DEs? I want my friend to be able  to switch between Gnome, Unity and KDE before commiting to one
you can manually download kubuntu-desktop, and xubuntu-desktop in ubuntu all u'll be able to use whichever u want
I meant from a life CD
just download xubuntu/kubuntu/ubuntu iso's and make 'em cds, easiest way, unless u don't wanna download too much. U could also use live usb drive with kubuntu/xubuntu-desktop installed on it
